column1: Kata Robata////And to apologize for forgetting our roll (or maybe because our friend was being such an ass to her?)
column2: she of course took the roll off our bill
column3: but also brought us gratis the most AMAZING dessert EVER!!!  Please order this when you go; I was blown away and I hate dessert.  I never eat it.  But I ate this one!   It was a nitrogen-frozen white chocolate mousse (can't find it on the online Kata Robata menu so I don't know the official name).  Good lord this thing was good - a tasty fresh huckleberry sauce on the side and green tea streusel.  Man I could eat this every day.
